price: और वे निर्भय होकर पर्वतों को काटकर घर बनाते थे।
arabic: وَكَانُواْ يَنۡحِتُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا ءَامِنِينَ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: wakānū yanḥitūna mina al-jibāli buyūtan āminīna
